teleexpertise.content:
The Medical Device Optim'IS is a software that allows the care team to request an expertise from Limoges Hospital Pharmacologists to define the optimal dosage for a patient. It provides
  • Calculation of the patient exposure to the drug (AUC) estimated with a limiter number of blood sampling using Bayesian estimators.
  • Modeled concentration–time curve
    • one or a range of dose(s) recommended by Limoges Hospital Experts to reach the AUC target To request access to this service, please contact Optim'Care: julie-vandenbergue@optim'care.com
teleexpertise.title: Immunosuppressants dose adjustment

telemonitoring.content:
The medical Device Optim'HomeCare is a telemonitoring solution to allow care team to monitor their patients at distance:
  • Clinical, biological and psychological monitoring.
  • Personalization of data to monitor, their frequency and of alerts thresholds .
  • Patients application includes practical and educational tools
To request access to this service, please contact Optim'Care: julie-vandenbergue@optim'care.com
telemonitoring.title: Telemonitoring

tools.description:
Optimal sampling times depend on the indication and the IS for which the adaptation is requested.

Below are the optimal sampling times for each dose adaptation for each combination of indication and IS. Please respect them to ensure a good quality of the results.
